google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Prasanta! You can disable the persistent indicator in the notification bar by opening the app Settings > Persistent notification and press the switch to disable the "Persistent indicator" option for Zorin Connect.

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Because Zorin Connect makes use of new underlying technologies, it is only compatible with the upcoming Zorin OS 15 release and higher. We plan to release the full stable version of Zorin OS 15 within the next 2 weeks.

google_play_reviews.content: Despite having some "similarities"  with KDE connect , this app provides a really nice user experience due to the fact that it's integrated with ZORIN OS 15 ,just on a button click i am able to share files between  my laptop and phone effortlessly (the file sharing works with phone hotspot and the transfer  rate is phenomenal  around 30-25 mb/s  ).  I only wish that there is an exit button on the phone  , i don't really need an always running app affecting my battery life when i don't really need it at that time
